.. _amdgpu_synid_gfx11_simm32_a3e80c:

simm32
======

An :ref:`integer_number<amdgpu_synid_integer_number>` or an :ref:`absolute_expression<amdgpu_synid_absolute_expression>`. The value is truncated to 32 bits.
